sections.title: Robert Molnar
sections.subTitle: Developer
description: Welcome to my portfolio!
As a seasoned web developer with over a decade of hands-on experience, I've honed my skills across
a diverse range of projects and roles. My specialty lies in
front-end development
, where I consistently deliver efficient and user-friendly solutions. My professional journey reflects my versatility
, from developing intricate enterprise systems to guiding aspiring developers and contributing to design engineering projects.
Take a moment to explore my varied experiences and the multitude of projects that have shaped my career.

sections.title: Tech
description: In the realm of web technology, my toolkit is robust and ever-evolving. I command a deep understanding of
JavaScript, HTML,
and CSS
, including LESS and SASS preprocessors. A strong foundation in
Node.js
and my expertise in
Handlebars
allow me to build semantic templates effectively. Few other technologies I worked with:
REST APIs, Web Services, Git/GitHub, Python, JQuery, C#, .NET, MySQL, knockout.js, TypeScript and React.

sections.title: Projects
description: The Projects section of my portfolio showcases a varied collection of initiatives
, each underscoring the depth of my professional expertise. These projects demonstrate my
ability to deliver creative solutions
, navigate complex challenges, and consistently advance within the field of web development.

sections.title: Portfolio
description: I've had the honor of collaborating with talented teams to construct these websites
, where I've made notable contributions to the
front-end development
, with varying degrees of involvement in each case.
